numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I noticed that more people of color are represented than people who are not people of color.
2. I noticed that the NBA has the most people of color.
3. I noticed that the WNBA has the most people of color.
4. I wonder what other sports could be represented in this graph.
5. I wonder why the maker of this graph chose only these sports.
7. This graph encourages more kids to look up to these individuals in these sports.
8. This graph encourages more kids to encourage themselves to be like these individuals.
9. If I were the maker of this graph then I would title this graph "Diversity in Major Sports Leagues".
